definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: temple-prostitute (man) (cf. RS:Proph. ii. N. 19, and v. As. Sub √);—´[[ק]]: De 23:18; coll. 1Ki 14:24, 1Ki 22:47; pl. [[קְדֵשִׁים]] 1Ki 15:12, 2Ki 23:7, Job 36:14; also f. [[קְדֵשָׁה]] (woman) De 23:18; pl. [[קְדֵשׁוֹת]] Ho 4:14; = harlot, fs. Ge 38:21, Ge 38:21, Ge 38:22 (J).
